Interfaces

Interface MechanicRA

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepairArea

    public interface MechanicRA
    Interface for Mechanic for the use of the Repair Area

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • checkCar

        int checkCar(int idCar,
             int mechanicId)
        Checks the needed parts for the car to repair
        Parameters:
        idCar - - id of the car to check
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        the id of the part needed for repair

      • repairCar

        boolean repairCar(int carId,
                  int partId,
                  int mechanicId)
        Checks availability of car parts and if available repairs the car
        Parameters:
        carId - - The Id of car to repair.
        partId - - The id of the car part needed for the repair.
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        true ready for repair. False otherwise

      • repairWaitingCarWithPartsAvailable

        int repairWaitingCarWithPartsAvailable(int mechanicId)
        Checks which of the waiting cars are ready for repair
        Parameters:
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        id of the car ready for repair.

      • concludeCarRepair

        void concludeCarRepair(int idCar,
                       int mechanicId)
        Conclude repair of the car.
        Parameters:
        idCar - - Id of the car.
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task

      • getMaxPartStock

        int getMaxPartStock(int partId)
        Get maximum number of a specific part that can be stored on the repairArea
        Parameters:
        partId - - Id of the car part.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of storage for the part

      • findNextTask

        int findNextTask(int mechanicId)
        Mechanic checks what has to do next
        Parameters:
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        the task that has to be done
